org.grapheditor.properties
Class GlobalProperties

java.lang.Object
  org.grapheditor.properties.GlobalProperties

public class GlobalProperties
extends java.lang.Object

This implements the design pattern singelton. It contains global properties and settings for the program. It has methods that outomatically saves and loads the properties till and from a properties file.

Author:
kjellw
